author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text: Finished watching #GirlFromPlainville & Elle Fanning did an absolutely gripping portrayal of Michelle. Tormented, disturbed, & twisted in every aspect. Michelle is a multifaceted mentally ill person. Elle played every layer as tragic & morose as we saw this displayed in the news.

author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text: Shout out to my new bestie Tori at GEICO who said May the 4th Be With You twice during our phone call and didn’t use it ironically. Also she told me I should go take a break. Idk if she’s married but there may be a proposal…💍 https://t.co/zHzRreGBQp

author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text: Clients should be allowed one phone call per day. This man did not need to call me when I was on my lunch and then call me again two hours later. And for what. Nothing that worth calling twice over in such a short window. 😤 https://t.co/O7uB95TK2o

author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text: Told my boss I was leaving early today but it turned out I mixed up my dates. So I am sitting at my desk alternating between eating Cheez-Its and Milanos. I was supposed to be out of office, this way I can pretend I left anyway. 🤷🏻‍♀️ https://t.co/TH5gt5lvSw

author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text:
My boss’s wife caught me leaving the new office and I had to tell her that I was too scared to use the elevator to go back downstairs.

Me: I’m scared to use the elevator…
Confused Wife: But why?? 
Me: Because I’m scared to use the elevator to go downstairs.
Wife: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
Me: https://t.co/cZiGntGy4U

author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text: Sometimes you just have to get the nagging static out of your head. Then you don’t necessarily feel better, but it’s not obsessively festering or holding you hostage. When your brain tells you that it has reached the limit and the switch gives, it has a will and a way regardless. https://t.co/irnEkpPGNd

author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text: I really don’t know what else I can offer anymore. I am tapped out. Because it’s never anyone else’s fault but mine. They don’t need consent because selfishness is a magnet. Toxic will attract alike. I am good with pretending too if that’s the persona you are going to perpetuate.

author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text: People are shit man. I wish they were more forthcoming with their ill intentions so I can avoid giving any of my energy. I am done putting myself out there for toxic usurpers and giving extra when I am already spread thin. I may be of no value to them, but I do know my own worth. https://t.co/6ysFKUAi7U

author: Lisa Steinberg 𓄿
text: 100% reached my capacity to put any effort into being a bigger or better person because this isn’t what I signed up for. I didn’t agree to last minute things being thrown at me or putting up with consistent incompetence. I’m done with taking on things that aren’t within my title. https://t.co/05wL1nf5vZ https://t.co/g6iCcjQwW4
